column5: MVIS reddit users are speculating of a sale volume of 50 per eye for the MVIS components in the Hololens 2 I hope MVIS will not sell the components so cheap I think 500 per Hololens 2 should be the minimum because this is still a low volume customer and components are usually more expansive in that case oldredditcomrMVIScomme
MVIS is anyone planning to do a teardown of Hololens to figure out if Microvision is inside I think its pretty obvious they are not
MVIS Loser Today is MVIS CEOs shifted latest target date for order entry four weeks and six days
